# gracePeriodExpiresDate

**Type**

The time when the Billing Grace Period for subscription renewals expires.

## Declaration

```swift
timestamp gracePeriodExpiresDate
```

## Discussion

For more information about billing grace periods, see [https://help.apple.com/app-store-connect/#/dev58bda3212].

## Billing status

- **isInBillingRetryPeriod**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the App Store is attempting to automatically renew an expired subscription.
